audioText: Elle part en vacances demain matin très tôt.
question: Elle ______ en vacances demain matin très tôt.
explanation: The text contains 'Elle part en vacances demain matin très tôt' - She leaves/goes on vacation tomorrow morning very early. 'Part' is the 3rd person singular present form of 'partir' (to leave/go), used with 'elle' (she).
